ayas.text: nazalat bika wa anta khayru manzūlin bih
ayas.bismillah: allāhumma inna hādhihi amatuka wabnatu `abdika wabnatu amatik

ayas.text: allāhumma inna lā na`lamu minhā illā khayrā
allāhumma in kānat muḥsinatan fazidfī iḥsānihā
wa in kānat musī-atan wa mudhnibah
waḥshur-hā ma`an nabiyyi wal a-immatiṭ ṭayyibīnaṭ ṭāhirīn
